name: San Cunha
desc: I hold a degree in Computer Science with expertise in the field of APIs, and I have knowledge in JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, and C#. I am also a great enthusiast of combinatorial optimization and its algorithms, focusing on the traveling salesman and vehicle routing problems.
